case.title: in the mood for you no games no bull bklyn man looking for you - 42 (bkay)
case.text: 40 6ft italian and spanish brooklyn seeks fun talk and a mind ! female bbw are welcome as always 420 no problem local even better! single dad kids at home we can go out for a walk sit home and watch t.v whatever be able to hold a converstaion be smart and a great and fun person to chill with and we will see what happens from there whatever your looking for try me i just might be in the same mood :)
